April 19-20

RSVP

Celebrate Easter

Please join us on on Saturday and Sunday as we celebrate Easter and present the inspiring story of Jesus Christ and His power to transform your life.

Easter Festival

April 19th - 10am | Al Radka Park

Easter Service

April 20th - 11am

Easter Festival

Our Easter festival is free for the community and features exciting games, face painting, and an exciting Easter egg hunt. Bring your basket, your family, and your friends to this amazing event!

The event will be located at Al Radka Park.

Sunday Service

Resurrection Sunday Service

Join us on Sunday, April 20th as we experience a memorable Easter celebration service. Join with friends as to hear encouraging Bible preaching that will highlight the life-changing truth of the death, burial, and resurrection of Jesus Christ.
